titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the right honourable the lord mayor and aldermen and citizens of London at St. Lawrence Jewry on the Feast of St. Michael, 1696 : at the election of the lord mayor for the year ensuing / by Lilly Butler.
titleStmt.author: Butler, Lilly.

notesStmt.note: Half title: Mr. Butler's sermon preach'd before the lord mayor and aldermen, &c. on the Feast of St. Michael, 1696.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
